name: Dungeon Master (all games)
description:
A role playing game.  WITH ADVENTURE!

1. Its completely open world

2. There are over 50+ dungeons to explore

3. Dungeon Master 2 comes with 2 whole regions to explore with ease

RECOMMENDED - Dungeon Master 2 is best, dungeon master 1 uses gross textures overall. And the maps are small, also the dungeons are copy and pasted.
